title: Low Water Levels Disrupt European River Cruises, a Favorite of U.S. Tourists
description: As the continent faces a severe drought, companies have had to use buses to transport passengers along parts of the Rhine and the Danube, where water levels have become too low for riverboats.
dc:creator: Jenny Gross
media:description: A tourist vessel cruised in the partially dried up riverbed of the Rhine River in Bingen, Germany, in August.
